segments.text: Susan , can you give me a hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to create a password for this document . Please tell me how to do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's easy . Press O and then P . Then it will ask you for your password .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do I do after I've typed in my password ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just press ENTER and you've done .
segments.speaker: S2
